title: (x) "Bitter with baggage" pen drawn geometric sans - MeMimas {Stephen}
content:
A friend is trying to identify this, any help would be appreciated:  
 [Bitter With Baggage](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023030109/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/reader/1582343764/ref=sib_dp_pt/002-2507307-6076040#readerpage)
author: robb

comments.content: It's MeMimas Alt [caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023030109/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=TO.10008.0.4&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=BITTER+WITH+BAGGAGE&sampleSize=32) and [lowercase script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023030109/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=TO.10008.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Sloane+Tanen&sampleSize=48) from the relatively unknown Spaniards: Type-Ø-Tones.
